languages.text: "День был долгим, но я знаю верный способ снять напряжение. Одна хорошая ночь вместе — что скажете?"
"It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"
languages.original_text: "День был долгим, но я знаю верный способ снять напряжение. Одна хорошая ночь вместе — что скажете?"

traits.locale_text: "It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"
"It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"
"It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"
"It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"
"It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"
"It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"

languages.text: "Es war ein langer Tag, aber ich kenne einen sicheren Weg, Spannung abzubauen. Eine schöne gemeinsame Nacht ... was meint Ihr?"
languages.original_text: "It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"

traits.locale_text: "Es war ein langer Tag, aber ich kenne einen sicheren Weg, Spannung abzubauen. Eine schöne gemeinsame Nacht ... was meint Ihr?"

languages.text: « La journée a été longue, mais je connais un excellent moyen de se détendre : en passant la nuit ensemble. Qu'en dites-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"

traits.locale_text: « La journée a été longue, mais je connais un excellent moyen de se détendre : en passant la nuit ensemble. Qu'en dites-vous ? »

languages.text: “真是漫长的一天，但我知道如何缓解紧张。我们一起共度良宵吧，你觉得呢？”
languages.original_text: "It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"

traits.locale_text: “真是漫长的一天，但我知道如何缓解紧张。我们一起共度良宵吧，你觉得呢？”

languages.text: «Ha sido un largo día, pero tengo una forma segura de aliviar tensión. Una buena noche en pareja... ¿Qué me dice?».
languages.original_text: "It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido un largo día, pero tengo una forma segura de aliviar tensión. Una buena noche en pareja... ¿Qué me dice?».

languages.text: 「長い一日でしたが、緊張をほぐすいい方法があります。一緒に晩を過ごすのはいかがですか？」
languages.original_text: "It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"

traits.locale_text: 「長い一日でしたが、緊張をほぐすいい方法があります。一緒に晩を過ごすのはいかがですか？」

languages.text: "Uzun bir gün oldu ancak gerilimi azaltmanın yolunu bilirim. Birlikte geçirilecek güzel bir gece. Olur mu?"
languages.original_text: "It's been a long day, but I know a sure way to relieve tension. One good night together — what do you say?"

traits.locale_text: "Uzun bir gün oldu lakin gerilimi azaltmanın emin bir yolunu bilirim. Birlikte geçirilecek güzel bir gece. Ne dersiniz?"
